title: Employment start date
p1: Tell us when you started working for the respondent.
p2: If you do not know the exact date then enter your best estimate.

startDate.required: Enter your employment start date. For example, 22 04 2014
startDate.dayRequired: Enter a day for your start date. For example, 23
startDate.monthRequired: Enter a month for your start date. For example, 04
startDate.yearRequired: Enter a year for your start date. For example, 1981
startDate.dayNotANumber: Day must only contain numbers. For example, 23
startDate.monthNotANumber: Month must only contain numbers. For example, 04
startDate.yearNotANumber: Year must only contain numbers. For example, 2014
startDate.invalidDate: You have entered an invalid date. Enter the date using the following format: 22 04 2014
startDate.invalidYear: You have entered the year in an invalid format. Enter the whole year, for example 2014
startDate.invalidDateInFuture: Date entered must be in the past
startDate.invalidDateTooFarInPast: You have entered a year which is too far in the past
startDate.invalidDateBeforeDOB: Date entered must not be earlier than your date of birth
